definition: Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen/also written 灶神
kitchen stove/kitchen
variant of 灶[zao4]
surname Wang
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to reign over
grandpa/old gentleman

sentences.english: Sometimes, he is shown standing next to a horse.
sentences.chinese: 有时，画像中的灶王爷是站在一匹马的旁边。

sentences.english: They are offering sacrifice to the Kitchen God.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在给灶王爷提供贡品。

sentences.english: The picture of the Kitchen God shows a man dressed in fine clothes.
sentences.chinese: 画像中的灶王爷穿着漂亮的衣服。

sentences.english: Another one is offering sacrifice to the Kitchen God.
sentences.chinese: 另外一种是给灶王爷提供贡品。

sentences.english: People offer a sacrifice to the Kitchen God on this day.
sentences.chinese: 这一天的活动叫做“祭灶”，也就是“拜灶王爷”。

sentences.english: At this time, people offer sacrifice to the kitchen god.
sentences.chinese: 在这一天，人们应该向灶王爷献祭。

sentences.english: The 23rd day of the 12th lunar month is called Preliminary Eve .
sentences.chinese: 在农历腊月23日人们会祭灶王爷。
